item.title: INTER MIAMI FOOTBALL HOME KIT 2023
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description: For the first time, the home kit is all pink, paying homage to the fans with heartbeat-style graphics on the cuffs and jocktag signoff. The polo collar and piqué fabric combo add to the sleek and classic look. Designed by adidas to optimize player performance on the field, this shirt features moisture-absorbing AEROREADY technology and mesh details for enhanced breathability.
item.content:encoded: For the first time, the home kit is all pink, paying homage to the fans with heartbeat-style graphics on the cuffs and jocktag signoff. The polo collar and piqué fabric combo add to the sleek and classic look. Designed by adidas to optimize player performance on the field, this shirt features moisture-absorbing AEROREADY technology and mesh details for enhanced breathability.

item.title: PORTUGAL NATIONAL FOOTBALL HOME KIT
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description: Carry your love for your favorite team with you wherever you go in this Portugal Soccer Jersey. Getting ready for the game's biggest tournament starts with the latest home jersey for the country. Inspired by that championship winning moment, the jersey mimics the look of the Portuguese flag draped over the players shoulders as they celebrate bringing home that iconic trophy. This pepper red jersey takes on that over-the-shoulder flag feeling and gives it a whole new look. Paired with a green diagonal color block on the Bottom of the jersey, you'll be able to carry that flag feeling with you wherever you go. Gold dart details hit the jersey perfectly and add the perfect look to an already iconic jersey. Look good and feel even better in the latest jersey for the Portuguese national team. Home to some of the best and most updated jersey technology, you'll have that unmatched feeling all season long.
item.content:encoded: Carry your love for your favorite team with you wherever you go in this Portugal Soccer Jersey. Getting ready for the game's biggest tournament starts with the latest home jersey for the country. Inspired by that championship winning moment, the jersey mimics the look of the Portuguese flag draped over the players shoulders as they celebrate bringing home that iconic trophy. This pepper red jersey takes on that over-the-shoulder flag feeling and gives it a whole new look. Paired with a green diagonal color block on the Bottom of the jersey, you'll be able to carry that flag feeling with you wherever you go. Gold dart details hit the jersey perfectly and add the perfect look to an already iconic jersey. Look good and feel even better in the latest jersey for the Portuguese national team. Home to some of the best and most updated jersey technology, you'll have that unmatched feeling all season long.

item.title: ARGENTINA NATIONAL FOOTBALL HOME KIT
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description:
Argentina's 2022 football shirt is largely white with black emblems. It notably displays the brand-new Adidas symbol, which made its first appearance in the 2022 World Cup uniforms. The new Argentina 2022 World Cup home game jersey has the team's original stripes on the front.
The stripes on the back are extremely special. The shirt has two thinner sky blue stripes in the center and two wider ones on either side, rather than all stripes of the same thickness.
These wider stripes are three times wider than the regular stripes and are meant to look like the Argentine flag. Argentina's national symbol, the Sol de Mayo, is located around the flag and visible on the back behind the collar.
item.content:encoded:
Argentina's 2022 football shirt is largely white with black emblems. It notably displays the brand-new Adidas symbol, which made its first appearance in the 2022 World Cup uniforms. The new Argentina 2022 World Cup home game jersey has the team's original stripes on the front.
The stripes on the back are extremely special. The shirt has two thinner sky blue stripes in the center and two wider ones on either side, rather than all stripes of the same thickness.
These wider stripes are three times wider than the regular stripes and are meant to look like the Argentine flag. Argentina's national symbol, the Sol de Mayo, is located around the flag and visible on the back behind the collar.

item.title: BRAZIL NATIONAL FOOTBALL HOME KIT
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description: The Brazil 2020/21 Nike home shirt is in the iconic yellow and green of The Seleção. It has a rounded neckline like the 1970 kit with matching sleeve cuffs. Tonal diamond shapes add detail to both areas of the jersey. Brazil’s 20/21 away kit is all blue with a tonal diamond effect on across its upper half.
item.content:encoded: The Brazil 2020/21 Nike home shirt is in the iconic yellow and green of The Seleção. It has a rounded neckline like the 1970 kit with matching sleeve cuffs. Tonal diamond shapes add detail to both areas of the jersey. Brazil’s 20/21 away kit is all blue with a tonal diamond effect on across its upper half.

item.title: REAL MADRID HOME FOOTBALL JERSEY 2023/24
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description:
Real Madrid fans have been given a sneak peek of their team’s home kit for the next season, thanks to the website Footy Headlines, which is known for its reliable leaks of football shirts and logos. The website has revealed several images of the Real Madrid 23-24 home kit, which has a modern yet simple design in white, navy and gold-yellow The kit features the new Adidas logo on the right chest, and the Real Madrid crest on the left chesty. The kit has a tricolor collar and sleeve cuffs in white, navy and gold-yellow. The kit also has navy panels on the sides and the back, similar to some Adidas 2022 World Cup kits.

One of the most notable details of the kit is the club’s slogan “¡Hala Madrid!” on the back of the collar, which is a first in the club’s history.
item.content:encoded:
Real Madrid fans have been given a sneak peek of their team’s home kit for the next season, thanks to the website Footy Headlines, which is known for its reliable leaks of football shirts and logos. The website has revealed several images of the Real Madrid 23-24 home kit, which has a modern yet simple design in white, navy and gold-yellow The kit features the new Adidas logo on the right chest, and the Real Madrid crest on the left chesty. The kit has a tricolor collar and sleeve cuffs in white, navy and gold-yellow. The kit also has navy panels on the sides and the back, similar to some Adidas 2022 World Cup kits.

One of the most notable details of the kit is the club’s slogan “¡Hala Madrid!” on the back of the collar, which is a first in the club’s history.

item.title: FC BAYERN HOME FOOTBALL JERSEY 2023/24
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description: FC Bayern’s unique success story is a constant theme: the German record champions and adidas are highlighting the club colours of red and white from a historical perspective in the home jersey for the 2023/24 season. The shirt reinterprets the iconic colours that stand for FC Bayern’s identity. It is made of a white base tone decorated with bold, deep red sleeves – a nod to the home kit worn by the players in 1965 when Bayern were promoted to the Bundesliga. The design is completed with the words “Rot & Weiß ein Leben lang” (red & white for life) inside the collar alongside the motto “Mia san mia”. New FC Bayern lettering and new-look player numbers will feature on the back.
item.content:encoded: FC Bayern’s unique success story is a constant theme: the German record champions and adidas are highlighting the club colours of red and white from a historical perspective in the home jersey for the 2023/24 season. The shirt reinterprets the iconic colours that stand for FC Bayern’s identity. It is made of a white base tone decorated with bold, deep red sleeves – a nod to the home kit worn by the players in 1965 when Bayern were promoted to the Bundesliga. The design is completed with the words “Rot & Weiß ein Leben lang” (red & white for life) inside the collar alongside the motto “Mia san mia”. New FC Bayern lettering and new-look player numbers will feature on the back.

item.title: MANCITY HOME FOOTBALL JERSEY 2023/24
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description:
The German apparel giant continues to lead the way among trendsetters with their stylish slew of options after taking the reins from Nike in 2019, and they may finally be able to deck out the club as Champions League winners after supplying plenty of strips fit for kings, as their team sits poised to pay off years of investment with the biggest prize of all.
PUMA and Man City unveiled the all-new Man City 2023-24 home kit on May 19. The new home kit celebrates the 20th anniversary of the club's historic move to the Etihad Stadium. Another iconic Sky Blue kit. Following the release of the home kit, the new Man City 2023-24 third kit was unveiled on July 25, exclusively launched in Tokyo, Japan, as part of City’s pre-season tour.
The unveiling of the Man City 2023-24 away kit followed on August 10, drawing inspiration from the towering mills, buzzing warehouses and industry of the city.
item.content:encoded:
The German apparel giant continues to lead the way among trendsetters with their stylish slew of options after taking the reins from Nike in 2019, and they may finally be able to deck out the club as Champions League winners after supplying plenty of strips fit for kings, as their team sits poised to pay off years of investment with the biggest prize of all.
PUMA and Man City unveiled the all-new Man City 2023-24 home kit on May 19. The new home kit celebrates the 20th anniversary of the club's historic move to the Etihad Stadium. Another iconic Sky Blue kit. Following the release of the home kit, the new Man City 2023-24 third kit was unveiled on July 25, exclusively launched in Tokyo, Japan, as part of City’s pre-season tour.
The unveiling of the Man City 2023-24 away kit followed on August 10, drawing inspiration from the towering mills, buzzing warehouses and industry of the city.

item.title: FC BARCELONA HOME FOOTBALL JERSEY 2023/24
item.dc:creator: sastojerseystore
item.description: “FC Barcelona is presenting a unique kit for the 2023/24 season, the Club’s first to be inspired by the women’s team. It has the classic broad stripes in original blaugrana colours, but with a significant detail – the badge set into a diamond. The diamond represents the first women’s team to ever play a game of football at the Spotify Camp Nou, an example of Barça’s pioneering spirit, always adopting a leading role in both sport and society, allied with continued success.”
item.content:encoded: “FC Barcelona is presenting a unique kit for the 2023/24 season, the Club’s first to be inspired by the women’s team. It has the classic broad stripes in original blaugrana colours, but with a significant detail – the badge set into a diamond. The diamond represents the first women’s team to ever play a game of football at the Spotify Camp Nou, an example of Barça’s pioneering spirit, always adopting a leading role in both sport and society, allied with continued success.”
